metadata.title: CVE-2017-9119 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The i_zval_ptr_dtor function in Zend/zend_variables.h in PHP 7.1.5 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact by triggering craftedoperations on array data structures.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11
libphp7.2-embed - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11
php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11
php7.2-bcmath - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11

criterions.comment: php7.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11').
